short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep laser sharp focus by blocking everything else.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that will help you focus on only few websites at a time and block everything else.

- It ask you to provide allowed websites to open and then block every other website.
- Different than every other focus extension you might have tried so far.
- So useful while writing, journaling and reading where you just need to focus on one thing.
